title: Democratic Party (Italy)
summary: The Democratic Party (Italian: Partito Democratico, PD) is a social-democratic political party in Italy.[2][3][4] The party's secretary is Enrico Letta, who was elected by the national assembly in March 2021,[9] after the resignation of the former leader Nicola Zingaretti,[10] while its president is Valentina Cuppi.[11]
